title: Thoughts on Twisted Treeline.
body:
I hope I'm posting this in the right section.

Anyway I want to hear your thoughts about twisted treeline. It seems like AOE champs dominate this map just like they do on Howling Abyss. For example ziggs.

replies.body:
actually from my experience so far, champs like garen and darius are gods here. otherwise its not just aoe champs, granted they are good because of the narrow lanes but its ones with aoe stuns/snares like viegar and annie.

on another note i only play ranked treeline due to too many bot accounts on blind pick TT
